title: [Medicine] Italian scientists have successfully completed a socially distant, remote-controlled surgery from 9-miles away. Using lasers, robots, and a 3D camera, this approach could be used for surgeries in remote parts of the world and in space aboard the ISS.

[Medicine] Researchers have found the first reliable way of isolating sperm stem cells from the testes and growing them outside the body. It could help infertile men have genetic children of their own.
